text:
Intact Design (https://intact.design/) | Berkeley, CA + Madison, WI | Full-time | Onsite

We're building a finite element analysis API on the web. Think of it like continuous integration, but for mechanical engineers. We're looking for experienced C++ software engineers to build a streaming data pipeline. Experience in the Apache streaming ecosystem of tools is a plus, but not required.

Have questions? We'd love to hear from you! Email: ataber[AT]intact-solutions[DOT]com
